pages.title: Mushroom Types
pages.text: There are 5 tiers of mushrooms 0 - 4.$(br2)Each mushroom can only be placed on a ground block with at leased its level.

pages.name: Tier 0
pages.text: Tier 0 is the base tier and only contains vanilla blocks. Because of this only basic mushroom can grow.
For better mushrooms you will need better ground.$(br2)Tier 1+ Ground also enables you to use $(item)mutagens$() & $(item)stabilizers$()
